steps: Run the file report.json to read the latest scan report
if not action exit else continue
create a new branch for the run, pull and rebase if needed
collect issues related to secret and make the changes locally first
Run the available tool from scan-tools to verify if issues is resolved
If tests pass create new branch
If possible create test cases for the changes made
Create PR with details of the changes made and title with format BUSINESSCLOUD: <brief description of the fix>
